item.title: PHPStan Setup
item.description: There is a good episode here https://www.phproundtable.com/episode/using-static-analyzers-to-improve-our-php-codebases that talks about this. The short of it is that it can easily catch some issues that your tests or IDE did not. For example I had a class name overlap due to a typo and it found it. From there it will output tons of other info that may just help guide you in your work. The install is super easy as seen in the docs https://github.
